text: What IDE to use for Google App Engine development in Python?
I'm trying to figure out what IDE to use for Google App Engine development in Python.
I'm completely new to Python, coming from a C#/.NET background.
I initially went down the route of getting the Eclipse plugin for Google App Engine development only to find out it was for Java development only.
Currently, I'm just using Notepad++ which, although a decent editor, I'm looking for a more full-blown IDE.
Maybe it's because I'm accustomed to Visual Studio when doing .NET development, but I figure there must be something better than just using Notepad++ to edit my Python/GAE code.
